verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2351>uproar<s%> had <S%G3973>ceased,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3343>sent<s%> for the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and when he had <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> them and <S%G782>taken<s%> his <S%G782>leave<s%> of them, he <S%G1831>departed<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And when he had <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>districts<s%> and had <S%G3870>given<s%> them <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3870>exhortation,<s%> <S%G3056><s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G1671>Greece.<s%>

And [there] he <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> and when a <S%G1917>plot<s%> was <S%G1096>formed<s%> <S%G1917>against<s%> him by the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G321>set<s%> <S%G321>sail<s%> for <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> he <S%G1096>determined<s%> <S%G1106><s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And he was <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> by <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G961>Berea,<s%> [the son] of <S%G4450>Pyrrhus;<s%> and by <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> and <S%G4580>Secundus<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians;<s%> and <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1190>Derbe,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy;<s%> and <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> and <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> of <S%G774>Asia.<s%>
But <S%G3778>these<s%> had <S%G4281>gone<s%> on <S%G4281>ahead<s%> and were <S%G3306>waiting<s%> for us at <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

And we <S%G1602>sailed<s%> from <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to them at <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G891>within<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days;<s%> and <S%G3699>there<s%> we <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And on the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> when we were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> [began] <S%G1256>talking<s%> to them, <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day,<s%> and he <S%G3905>prolonged<s%> his <S%G3056>message<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight.<s%>
And there were <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> in the <S%G5253>upper<s%> <S%G5253>room<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together.<s%>

And there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3494>young<s%> <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus<s%> <S%G2516>sitting<s%> on the <S%G2376>window<s%> <S%G2376>sill,<s%> <S%G2702>sinking<s%> into a <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep;<s%> and as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> kept on <S%G1256>talking,<s%> he was <S%G2702>overcome<s%> by <S%G5258>sleep<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from the <S%G5152>third<s%> <S%G5152>floor,<s%> and was <S%G142>picked<s%> up <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

But <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> and <S%G1968>fell<s%> upon him and after <S%G4843>embracing<s%> him, he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do not be <S%G2350>troubled,<s%> for his <S%G5590>life<s%> is in him."

And when he had <S%G305>gone<s%> [back] up, and had <S%G2806>broken<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G1089>eaten,<s%> he <S%G3656>talked<s%> with them a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G2425>while,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G827>daybreak,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
And they <S%G71>took<s%> <S%G71>away<s%> the <S%G3816>boy<s%> <S%G2198>alive,<s%> and were <S%G3756>greatly<s%> <S%G3357><s%> <S%G3870>comforted.<s%>

But we, <S%G4281>going<s%> <S%G4281>ahead<s%> to the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G321>set<s%> <S%G321>sail<s%> for <S%G789>Assos,<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> to <S%G353>take<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> on <S%G353>board;<s%> for <S%G3779>thus<s%> he had <S%G1299>arranged<s%> it, <S%G3195>intending<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to <S%G3978>go<s%> by <S%G3978>land.<s%>
And <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> us at <S%G789>Assos,<s%> we <S%G353>took<s%> him on <S%G353>board<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3412>Mitylene.<s%>

And <S%G636>sailing<s%> from <S%G2547>there,<s%> we <S%G2658>arrived<s%> the <S%G7075>following<s%> day <S%G481>opposite<s%> <S%G5508>Chios;<s%> and the <S%G2087>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>crossed<s%> <S%G3846>over<s%> to <S%G4544>Samos;<s%> and the day <S%G2192>following<s%> we <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3399>Miletus.<s%>

For <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>decided<s%> to <S%G3896>sail<s%> <S%G3896>past<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> that he <S%G1096>might<s%> not have to <S%G5551>spend<s%> <S%G5551>time<s%> in <S%G773>Asia;<s%> for he was <S%G4692>hurrying<s%> to be in <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> on the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>
And from <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> and <S%G3333>called<s%> to him the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G3854>come<s%> to him, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G1987>know,<s%> from the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> that I <S%G1910>set<s%> <S%G1910>foot<s%> in <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> I was with you the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%>

<S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>humility<s%> and with <S%G1144>tears<s%> and with <S%G3986>trials<s%> which <S%G4819>came<s%> upon me <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1917>plots<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%>

<S%G5613>how<s%> I did not <S%G5288>shrink<s%> from <S%G312>declaring<s%> to you <S%G3762>anything<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable,<s%> and <S%G1321>teaching<s%> you <S%G1219>publicly<s%> and from <S%G3624>house<s%> to <S%G3624>house,<s%>

<S%G1263>solemnly<s%> <S%G1263>testifying<s%> to <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G4102>faith<s%> in our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

"And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> I <S%G4198>am<s%> on my <S%G4198>way<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> not <S%G3609>knowing<s%> what will <S%G4876>happen<s%> to me <S%G1722>there,<s%> <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4133>except<s%> that the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1263>solemnly<s%> <S%G1263>testifies<s%> to me in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that <S%G1199>bonds<s%> and <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>await<s%> me.

"But I do not <S%G4160>consider<s%> my <S%G5590>life<s%> of <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> as <S%G5093>dear<s%> to <S%G1683>myself,<s%> in <S%G5613>order<s%> that I may <S%G5048>finish<s%> my <S%G1408>course,<s%> and the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> to <S%G1263>testify<s%> <S%G1263>solemnly<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> of you, <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1330>went<s%> <S%G1330>about<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> will <S%G3708>see<s%> my <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more.<s%>
<S%G1360>"Therefore<s%> I <S%G3143>testify<s%> to you <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2513>innocent<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men.<s%>
"For I did not <S%G5288>shrink<s%> from <S%G312>declaring<s%> to you the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G1012>purpose<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"Be on <S%G4337>guard<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> and for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4168>flock,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> has <S%G5087>made<s%> you <S%G1985>overseers,<s%> to <S%G4165>shepherd<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4046>purchased<s%> with His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

"I <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3326>after<s%> my <S%G867>departure<s%> <S%G926>savage<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> will <S%G1525>come<s%> in <S%G1519>among<s%> you, not <S%G5339>sparing<s%> the <S%G4168>flock;<s%>

and from <S%G1537>among<s%> your own <S%G846>selves<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> will <S%G450>arise,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1294>perverse<s%> <S%G1294>things,<s%> to <S%G645>draw<s%> <S%G645>away<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> them.

<S%G1352>"Therefore<s%> be on the <S%G1127>alert,<s%> <S%G3421>remembering<s%> that <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day<s%> for a <S%G5148>period<s%> of <S%G5148>three<s%> <S%G5148>years<s%> I did not <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> with <S%G1144>tears.<s%>

"And <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G3908>commend<s%> you to <S%G2316>God<s%> and to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of His <S%G5485>grace,<s%> which is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G3618>build<s%> [you] up and to <S%G1325>give<s%> [you] the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
"I have <S%G1937>coveted<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> one's <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2441>clothes.<s%>
"You <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G5256>ministered<s%> to my [own] <S%G5532>needs<s%> and to the men who were with me.

"In <S%G3956>everything<s%> I <S%G5263>showed<s%> you that by <S%G2872>working<s%> <S%G2872>hard<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> you <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G482>help<s%> the <S%G770>weak<s%> and <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'It is <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G2983>receive.<s%>'"
And when he had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> he <S%G1119>knelt<s%> <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> <S%G1119><s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> with them <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And they [began] to <S%G2805>weep<s%> <S%G2425>aloud<s%> and <S%G1968>embraced<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5137><s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and repeatedly <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him,

<S%G3600>grieving<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G3004>spoken,<s%> that they <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> his <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more.<s%> And they were <S%G4311>accompanying<s%> him to the <S%G4143>ship.<s%>
